isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - INSTALL - RIGHT REVERSE IDLER GEAR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: If previously removed, thread pipe plug in the rear of the reverse idler shaft and tighten ( Figure 227). Install the thrust washer to the end of the idler plate ( inset, Figure 227).

figure.caption: Figure 227. Thread Pipe Plug in Rear of Reverse Idler Shaft and Install Thrust Washer

note.para: If previously removed, replace the needle bearing into the bore of the reverse idler gear.

step1.para: Install the bearing inner race on the idler shaft and insert shaft into the case bore, threaded end of shaft to the front. As the idler shaft is moved forward, install the reverse idler gear on the shaft, long hub to the front and seating on the bearing inner race. Position the thrust washer on the shaft between the gear and support boss in the case and continue with movement of the idler shaft forward into the bore of the support boss ( Figure 228).

Making sure that the reverse idler shaft is seated in the bore of support boss and forward as far as possible, install the washer and stop nut on the front of the shaft ( Figure 229). Tighten nut to 50 to 60 ft-lbs. (68 to 81 N· m).

figure.caption: Figure 229. Install Washer and Stop Nut on Front of Shaft

step1.para: Install the OUTER RACE of auxiliary countershaft front bearing into the case bore ( Figure 230).

figure.caption: Figure 230. Install Outer Race of Auxiliary Countershaft Front Bearing

note.para: The bearing INNER RACE is installed on the front of the auxiliary countershaft and never with the outer race.
